name: December 20XX
description:
December 20XX

Escaping into the forest to avoid the apocalypse you and your companion, hearth bot head deep into the woods.

Controls:
WASD/Arrows Keys/Joystick - To Move
E/Controller A or B - To Interact

more prompts in game

Keep hearth bot going by feeding it fuel from the branches and logs of trees.

Note: When launching the game in browser it may take up to a minute. There are also Windows/Mac downloads  if you prefer that.
